Author: redhotjillypepper
Text: VEGGIES. BROCCOLI. CAULIFLOWER. SALAD. SWEET POTATO (not too much). ZUCCHINI. SQUASH.   FRUITS. STRAWBERRIES. HONESTLY THATS THE ONLY FRUIT I LIKE SO THATS MY ONLY RECOMMENDATION LOL  IF YOU DONT GET RELIEF SOON ENOUGH TRY METAMUCIL.  &#x200B;  &#x200B;  IM TYPING IN CAPS BECASUE IM DRUNK AND IM PASSIONATE ABOUT THIS
